translations: v.气得咬牙（gnash 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 咬牙, 咬牙切齿, 磨牙
哀一牙, 一个牙齿咬牙切齿, 咬牙切齿之一颗

sentences.sentence: He'll be gnashing his teeth when he hears that we lost the contract.
sentences.translation: 他要是听说我们丢了这份合同，准会气得咬牙切齿。

sentences.sentence: If you couldn't attend either of the concerts and are currently gnashing your teeth at having missed out, don't despair.
sentences.translation: 如果你两场音乐会都去不了而为此咬牙切齿的话，别绝望。

sentences.sentence: Andthis leads to "weeping and gnashing of teeth," i.e. sorrow and depression.
sentences.translation: 这将导致“哭泣和咬牙切齿”，就是指悲伤和绝望。
